About Us

Welcome to noiSENSOR

The ultimate solution for a comprehensive noise level monitoring and warning, ensuring a quieter and more peaceful environment for all. This offers real-time data insights and customizable alerts, allowing you to proactively manage noise levels and enhance the quality of life in any setting.

Step into a world of tranquility with NoiSENSOR. Experience the power of precise noise control to create a harmonious and serene atmosphere.

Sound Range

Noise Levels in Decibel Scale

  • Quiet

    The environment is generally very peaceful and calm. People can experience a serene atmosphere with minimal or no background noise. It is ideal for activities that require concentration, relaxation, or a tranquil environment.

    Noise Level

    0 - 30 dB

  • Normal

    Typical everyday sounds such as conversation, household appliances, moderate traffic noise, or background music. It is usually not too distracting and allows for regular communication and work without significant disturbance.

    Noise Level

    36 - 60 dB

  • Moderate

    This level of noise is noticeable and may cause a moderate amount of disturbance. It can include sounds like a crowded restaurant or a bustling office. While it may not be overwhelmingly loud, it can make it harder to concentrate.

    Nosie Level

    61 - 80 dB

  • High

    This level of noise is loud and can be potentially harmful to hearing if prolonged exposure occurs. It includes construction sites or loud concerts. It is important to take precautions to prevent hearing damage and discomfort.

    Noise Level

    above 80 dB
